title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.8 - Effect of suspension
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4822.8 - Effect of suspension

State Regulations

No licensed authorized organization that has voluntarily
suspended the conduct of bingo for a period beyond three continuous months or
has had such organization's bingo license suspended by competent authority for
a period beyond six months, or indefinitely, shall rent or allow the use of
such organization's premises for the conduct of bingo. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4822.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
